remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以將屬性的任何 HTML 控制項配接器所呼叫方法。The method can be called by any HTML control adapter to add an attribute. 因為它是虛擬的它也可以自訂配接器，繼承此方法。Because it is virtual, it also can be customized by adapters that inherit this method. 若要判斷裝置是否支援存取索引鍵屬性，請使用屬性。To determine whether a device supports an access key attribute, use the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 和 WML 配接器會設定支援呼叫的概念*第二個 UI*。The HTML and WML adapter sets support a concept called *secondary UI*. 第二個 UI 是由控制項以顯示其他 UI 畫面的 Windows 架構應用程式顯示對話方塊的方式相同。Secondary UI is used by controls that need to show additional screens of UI, in the same way that a Windows-based application shows dialog boxes. 如需第二個使用者介面的詳細資訊，請參閱[配接器集功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/903adf84-e45c-407e-8b55-98796c084ff7)文件。For more information about secondary user interfaces, see the [Adapter Sets Functionality](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/903adf84-e45c-407e-8b55-98796c084ff7) documentation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性供類別以決定是否產生標記中需要表單標記。This property is used by the class to determine whether the form tag is needed in the resulting markup. 目前，只有 cHTML 介面卡上的設定會被辨識。Currently, only the settings on cHTML adapters are recognized. 不過，您可以使用這個屬性，在您的配接器提供您自己的轉譯。However, you can use this property to provide your own rendering in your adapters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 和 WML 配接器會設定支援呼叫的概念*第二個 UI*。The HTML and WML adapter sets support a concept called *secondary UI*. 第二個 UI 會使用需要其他 UI 畫面的顯示方式與在 Windows 架構應用程式的對話方塊相同的控制項。Secondary UI is used by controls that need to show additional screens of UI, in the same way as a dialog box in a Windows-based application. 如需第二個使用者介面的詳細資訊，請參閱[配接器集功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/903adf84-e45c-407e-8b55-98796c084ff7)。For more information about secondary user interfaces, see [Adapter Sets Functionality](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/903adf84-e45c-407e-8b55-98796c084ff7).
